name: Andres Garcia
title: Software Developer
sumary: Im specialized in Python and JavaScript. My favorite frameworks are Fastapi, Sqlalchemy, React and React Native. For DevOps I use Docker and Terraform also I'm proficent in English, Spanish and Italian.

work.title: Progect Mananger and Fullstack Developer
